articles.headline: TAXES - Naming debtors
articles.summary: The article examines Waterbury's fiscal crisis fueled by $55 million in delinquent taxes, revealing the top debtors and the systemic issues in the tax collection process.

articles.headline: SEX OFFENDERS - Mapping molesters
articles.summary: An investigation unmasks flaws in Florida's child molester legislation, revealing many offenders living near schools against the '1000-foot rule'.

articles.headline: CORRUPTION - Investigating a mayor
articles.summary: Former Camden mayor Milton Milan was sentenced for corruption involving mob ties and campaign fund theft, unearthed by investigative reporting.

articles.headline: COUNTY CONTRACTS - Program study
articles.summary: A study of Palm Beach County's affirmative action program confirms its success in increasing contracts to minority and women-owned businesses since 1991.
